faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How accurate is the Five Senses Test?
faq.a1: Our Five Senses Test is designed based on extensive scientific research and Chinese medicine theory, validated by thousands of users with an accuracy rate exceeding 95%. The test employs a multi-dimensional assessment method to ensure reliability and stability of results.
faq.q2: How soon will I see effects from the five-tone or five-color healing plan?
faq.a2: Most users begin to experience noticeable effects after consistently using the plan for 2-4 weeks. Minor issues (such as mild anxiety, decreased sleep quality) typically improve within 2 weeks, while chronic issues (such as long-term stress, mood swings) may require 1-3 months of continued practice.
faq.q3: Do I need a professional music or art background?
faq.a3: Not at all. Our five-tone and five-color healing plans are designed to be simple and accessible for everyone, regardless of music or art background. The plans include detailed guidance and instructions to ensure you can easily get started.
faq.q4: What if I'm sensitive to both music and colors?
faq.a4: This is completely normal! Many people have sensitivity to both music and colors, just to different degrees. Our test will assess which sensory sensitivity is stronger and prioritize the corresponding healing plan. In our advanced packages, we provide comprehensive five-tone and five-color healing plans to address multiple sensory sensitivities.
faq.q5: How much time does the five-tone or five-color healing plan require daily?
faq.a5: Basic healing exercises only require 10-15 minutes daily, suitable for busy modern individuals. You can flexibly arrange to do them after waking up in the morning or before bed at night. Intensive exercises for specific health goals may require 20-30 minutes, but the frequency can be adjusted according to individual circumstances.
faq.q6: Can I get support if I have questions after purchase?
faq.a6: Absolutely. All packages include email support services, and the Professional and VIP packages also include one-on-one expert consultation services. Our professional team will promptly address any questions you encounter during practice to ensure you achieve the best healing effects.

testStart.title: Ready to discover your sensory talent?
testStart.description: This test will evaluate your sensitivity to music and colors, taking approximately 5 minutes
features: Test includes music and color sensitivity assessment
Get detailed analysis of your sensory talent
Receive personalized Chinese medicine five-tone or five-color healing plan

musicTest.title: Music Sensitivity Test
musicTest.instruction: Please listen to the following five music clips and rate how each music affects your emotions (1-5 points)
musicTest.ratingQuestion: How relaxed and comfortable does this music make you feel?

colorTest.title: Color Sensitivity Test
colorTest.instruction: Please observe the following five colors and rate how each color affects your emotions (1-5 points)
colorTest.ratingQuestion: How comfortable and pleasant does this color make you feel?

analyzing.title: Analyzing your test results...
analyzing.description: Our AI is analyzing your sensory sensitivity data, please wait a moment

result.title: Test Complete! Discover Your Sensory Talent
result.description: Based on your test results, we've discovered your sensory talent is:
result.recommendationText: As a color-sensitive person, Chinese medicine five-color therapy will be the most suitable healing method for you. We recommend:
recommendations: Introduce more green and blue elements in your home and work environment to help regulate emotions
Try color meditation for 5-10 minutes daily to enhance energy and focus
Choose a five-color diet plan suitable for you to enhance physical health
Use light therapy equipment for deeper five-color healing
result.cta: Want to get a complete five senses analysis report and professional customized healing plan?

knowledge.title: Knowledge Base
knowledge.featuredTitle: Traditional Chinese Five Elements Theory in Modern Health
knowledge.featuredDescription: Explore how ancient five elements theory can be applied in contemporary life, from diet and environment to emotional management.
knowledge.soundArticleTitle: Five Tones for Five Organs: Classical Music Healing Guide
knowledge.soundArticleDescription: Explore how Jiao, Zhi, Gong, Shang, and Yu tones affect the health of liver, heart, spleen, lung, and kidney according to traditional wisdom.
knowledge.colorArticleTitle: Beauty of Five Colors: Color Applications in Chinese Health
knowledge.colorArticleDescription: From clothing, food, to environment design, how to use green, red, yellow, white, and black colors to balance body and mind.
knowledge.seasonArticleTitle: Follow Nature: Five Elements and Seasonal Wellness Rules
knowledge.seasonArticleDescription: How to adjust living habits according to the characteristics of spring, summer, late summer, autumn, and winter to maintain health.
